Caption: Dr. Singhvi is a Philanthropist of Indian origin and management expert based in London. He is best known for the Professional Chairs at IIT Madras and IIT Roorkee. Dr. Ajit Singhvi has coauthored the handbook Fast Tracking to Managerial and CEO Roles
Description: Dr. Singhvi is a Philanthropist of Indian origin and management expert based in London. He is best known for the Professional Chairs at IIT Madras and IIT Roorkee. Dr. Ajit Singhvi has coauthored the handbook Fast Tracking to Managerial and CEO Roles
